name: Bubble Strike (itch)
description:
Dive into the Adventure of Top Down Shooting , In a world full of Enemies try to Hurt you , and you Have To FIGHT!!

You are the Blue One that can Shoot to Unique Enemies.

There is an enemy that try to Touch you , Don't Let Him DO That !!

There is an enemy that try to Shoot you , Dodge the Attacks !!

And Don't Forget , TO FIGHT THE BOSS!!

_______________________________________________________________________________

The Controls are simple;

=> w,a,s,d  / or Arrows to Move.

=> Left Click to Shoot.

=> Right Click to use the Powers.

_______________________________________________________________________________

Credits:

all the Programing and Art My ME! :)

and Music from FreeSound.org  website

_______________________________________________________________________________

How to Install:

1- extract the file.

2- open "bubblestrike.exe"

3- enjoy ! :)
